*[[Qualcomm Atheros QCA9008-TBD1]] 802.11abgn/ac/ad + BT module :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/PPD-QCA9008-TBD1 PPD-QCA9008-TBD1] (2015-08-17) (NGFF 2230, Key A+E) :2T2R 802.11abgn+ac QCA6174, 1T1R 802.11ad QCA9500 (4.6Gbps) :OUI: WiFi+BT: 44:39:C4 (USI), WiGig: 04:CE:14 (Wilosity) *[[Qualcomm Atheros QCA9008-SBD1]] 802.11ad module (M.2 1216) :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/PPD-QCA9008-SBD1 PPD-QCA9008-SBD1] (2015-08-19) 802.11ad QCA9500
==Links of Interest== ===Reviews=== *[http://www.hardwarezone.com.sg/review-tp-link-talon-ad7200-80211ad-router-review-blazing-ahead-60ghz ''TP-LINK Talon AD7200 Router'' on '''HardwareZone'''] :while the single stream 60GHz radio is by powered :by [[Qualcomm Atheros#ad]] QCA9500 chipset
